apple_vendor_description: Apple’s rendering of this couple emoji showcases a warm embrace between a woman and a man, each depicted with medium-dark and medium skin tones respectively, as seen on Apple devices.  The figures are drawn with soft, rounded edges and gentle curvature, emphasizing their connection and affection. A vibrant red heart, rendered with Apple’s characteristic glossy 3D shading, floats between them, symbolizing love, partnership, and enduring romance, making it a beautiful way to express strong bonds in messages.
